list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: Implement drag-and-drop functionality and active tab persistence
- Enabled drag-and-drop functionality for table rows using SortableJS. - Restricted drag-and-drop to logged-in users only for better control and security. - Added localStorage integration to persist active tab selection across page refreshes. - Simplified template structure: - Removed redundant `{% if not is_logged_in %}` checks and placeholder messages. - Streamlined the table rendering logic to enhance maintainability. - Improved JavaScript for modularity: - Centralized drag-and-drop initialization within `DOMContentLoaded`. - Enhanced tab switch handling to ensure compatibility with localStorage. - Refactored redundant code for better readability and performance.
This update provides a more secure and user-friendly interface with seamless tab navigation and reordering functionality.
